mapper.insert: insert into tb_k3_sal_order ( fid, fbilltypeid, fbillno, fdate, fcustid, fsaleorgid, fsalegroupid, fsaledeptid, fsalerid, fcreatorid, fcreatedate, fmodifierid, fmodifydate, fdocumentstatus, fapproverid, fapprovedate, fclosestatus, fcloserid, fclosedate, fcancelstatus, fcancellerid, fcanceldate, freceiveid, fsettleid, fchargeid, fversionno, fchangereason, fchangedate, fchangerid, fnote, fbusinesstype, fheadlocid, fheadlocaddress, fheaddeliveryway, fcountry, freceiveaddress, fcreditcheckresult, fobjecttypeid, ffinalversion, foriginalfid, fcorrespondorgid, freccontactid, fnetorderbillno, fnetorderbillid, foppid, fsalephaseid, fisinit, fismobile, tc_define_rowid, tc_erp_code, tc_erp_add_time, tc_sync_status, tc_sync_msg, tc_sync_save_time, tc_sync_submit_time, tc_sync_audit_time) values ( #{fid}, #{fbilltypeid}, #{fbillno}, #{fdate}, #{fcustid}, #{fsaleorgid}, #{fsalegroupid}, #{fsaledeptid}, #{fsalerid}, #{fcreatorid}, #{fcreatedate}, #{fmodifierid}, #{fmodifydate}, #{fdocumentstatus}, #{fapproverid}, #{fapprovedate}, #{fclosestatus}, #{fcloserid}, #{fclosedate}, #{fcancelstatus}, #{fcancellerid}, #{fcanceldate}, #{freceiveid}, #{fsettleid}, #{fchargeid}, #{fversionno}, #{fchangereason}, #{fchangedate}, #{fchangerid}, #{fnote}, #{fbusinesstype}, #{fheadlocid}, #{fheadlocaddress}, #{fheaddeliveryway}, #{fcountry}, #{freceiveaddress}, #{fcreditcheckresult}, #{fobjecttypeid}, #{ffinalversion}, #{foriginalfid}, #{fcorrespondorgid}, #{freccontactid}, #{fnetorderbillno}, #{fnetorderbillid}, #{foppid}, #{fsalephaseid}, #{fisinit}, #{fismobile}, #{tcDefineRowid}, #{tcErpCode}, #{tcErpAddTime}, #{tcSyncStatus}, #{tcSyncMsg}, #{tcSyncSaveTime}, #{tcSyncSubmitTime}, #{tcSyncAuditTime})
mapper.update: update tb_k3_sal_order set fid = #{fid}, fbilltypeid = #{fbilltypeid}, fbillno = #{fbillno}, fdate = #{fdate}, fcustid = #{fcustid}, fsaleorgid = #{fsaleorgid}, fsalegroupid = #{fsalegroupid}, fsaledeptid = #{fsaledeptid}, fsalerid = #{fsalerid}, fcreatorid = #{fcreatorid}, fcreatedate = #{fcreatedate}, fmodifierid = #{fmodifierid}, fmodifydate = #{fmodifydate}, fdocumentstatus = #{fdocumentstatus}, fapproverid = #{fapproverid}, fapprovedate = #{fapprovedate}, fclosestatus = #{fclosestatus}, fcloserid = #{fcloserid}, fclosedate = #{fclosedate}, fcancelstatus = #{fcancelstatus}, fcancellerid = #{fcancellerid}, fcanceldate = #{fcanceldate}, freceiveid = #{freceiveid}, fsettleid = #{fsettleid}, fchargeid = #{fchargeid}, fversionno = #{fversionno}, fchangereason = #{fchangereason}, fchangedate = #{fchangedate}, fchangerid = #{fchangerid}, fnote = #{fnote}, fbusinesstype = #{fbusinesstype}, fheadlocid = #{fheadlocid}, fheadlocaddress = #{fheadlocaddress}, fheaddeliveryway = #{fheaddeliveryway}, fcountry = #{fcountry}, freceiveaddress = #{freceiveaddress}, fcreditcheckresult = #{fcreditcheckresult}, fobjecttypeid = #{fobjecttypeid}, ffinalversion = #{ffinalversion}, foriginalfid = #{foriginalfid}, fcorrespondorgid = #{fcorrespondorgid}, freccontactid = #{freccontactid}, fnetorderbillno = #{fnetorderbillno}, fnetorderbillid = #{fnetorderbillid}, foppid = #{foppid}, fsalephaseid = #{fsalephaseid}, fisinit = #{fisinit}, fismobile = #{fismobile}, tc_erp_code = #{tcErpCode}, tc_erp_add_time = to_date(#{tcErpAddTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), tc_sync_status = #{tcSyncStatus}, tc_sync_msg = #{tcSyncMsg}, tc_sync_save_time = to_date(#{tcSyncSaveTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), tc_sync_submit_time = to_date(#{tcSyncSubmitTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), tc_sync_audit_time = to_date(#{tcSyncAuditTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') where tc_define_rowid = #{tcDefineRowid}
mapper.sql: t.fid, t.fbilltypeid, t.fbillno, t.fdate, t.fcustid, t.fsaleorgid, t.fsalegroupid, t.fsaledeptid, t.fsalerid, t.fcreatorid, t.fcreatedate, t.fmodifierid, t.fmodifydate, t.fdocumentstatus, t.fapproverid, t.fapprovedate, t.fclosestatus, t.fcloserid, t.fclosedate, t.fcancelstatus, t.fcancellerid, t.fcanceldate, t.freceiveid, t.fsettleid, t.fchargeid, t.fversionno, t.fchangereason, t.fchangedate, t.fchangerid, t.fnote, t.fbusinesstype, t.fheadlocid, t.fheadlocaddress, t.fheaddeliveryway, t.fcountry, t.freceiveaddress, t.fcreditcheckresult, t.fobjecttypeid, t.ffinalversion, t.foriginalfid, t.fcorrespondorgid, t.freccontactid, t.fnetorderbillno, t.fnetorderbillid, t.foppid, t.fsalephaseid, t.fisinit, t.fismobile, t.tc_define_rowid, t.tc_erp_code, to_char(t.tc_erp_add_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') tc_erp_add_time, t.tc_sync_status, t.tc_sync_msg, to_char(t.tc_sync_save_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') tc_sync_save_time, to_char(t.tc_sync_submit_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') tc_sync_submit_time, to_char(t.tc_sync_audit_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') tc_sync_audit_time

t1.fentryid, t1.fid as t1_fid, t1.fseq, t1.fmapid, t1.fmapname, t1.fmaterialid, t1.fauxpropid, t1.fbomid, t1.funitid, t1.fqty, t1.fbaseunitid, t1.fbaseunitqty, t1.fnote as t1_fnote, t1.fmrpfreezestatus, t1.ffreezedate, t1.ffreezerid, t1.fmrpterminatestatus, t1.fterminaterid, t1.fterminatestatus, t1.fterminatedate, t1.fmrpclosestatus, t1.flot, t1.fchangeflag, t1.fstockorgid, t1.fstockid, t1.flockqty, t1.flockflag, t1.fownertypeid as t1_fownertypeid, t1.fownerid as t1_fownerid, t1.flot_text, t1.fproducedate, t1.fexpirydate, t1.fexpunit, t1.fexpperiod, t1.freturntype, t1.fbflowid, t1.fpriority, t1.fmtono, t1.freservetype, t1.fplandeliverydate, t1.fdeliverystatus, t1.foldqty, t1.fpromotionmatchtype, t1.fsupplyorgid, t1.fnetorderentryid, t1.fstockunitid, t1.fstockqty, t1.fstockbaseqty, t1.fleftqty, t1.fdeliverydate, t1.fsettleorgids, t1.foutlmtunit, t1.tc_define_rowid as t1_tc_define_rowid

choose.otherwise:
select tt.* from ( select from tb_k3_sal_order t
) tt
